g.title: SVG Text Scaling with with font-size-adjust
g.desc: The black square should match the reference. The x-height of the Ahem font is 0.8. Given a font size of 100px and font-size-adjust: 1, the adjusted font size becomes 125px (1 / 0.8 * 100). Since the text is scaled up by a factor of 2, the final rendered font size should be 250px.
